# EIT Jumpstarter. European Pre-Acceleration Programme (call for applications)-- AGH UST 

URL: https://agh.edu.pl/en/students/events/detail/s/eit-jumpstarter-european-pre-acceleration-programme-call-for-applications
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:22:23

EIT Jumpstarter. European Pre-Acceleration Programme (call for applications)

 02.04.2025 

 Download iCal file 

Add to Google Calendar

Add to Outlook Calendar

Add to Office 365 Calendar

Add to Yahoo Calendar

 The call for applications to the EIT Jumpstarter, a European pre-acceleration programme, ends on 2 April 2025. This is a perfect opportunity for innovators, scientists, students, and doctoral students to bring ideas to the next stage of their journey, namely on the market. 

 Description 

The programme is addressed to people/teams from Central, Eastern, and Southern Europe who develop innovative ideas in one of the eight categories, powered and mentored by different by 
EIT Knowledge and Innovation Communities
 (EIT KICs): Healthcare, Food & Agritech, Metals, minerals, advanced materials & industrial side streams, Energy and Renewables, Advanced and Green Manufacturing, Smart Cities and Mobility, New European Bauhaus, Rebuild Ukraine.

The programme entails:

    7-month training programme to help design and verify a business model in line with the Lean Startup methodology,

    workshops and mentoring by EIT experts and partners,

    financial support covering travel and accomodation costs,

    access to international network of contacts.

The best teams will receive financial prizes.

Participation in EIT Jumpstarter is free.

More information, application process
